title: The Universe Jumper - Novel Updates
author: Hao Jing Fang   郝景芳
description: This story revolves around four young characters who used historical artifacts and evidence to discover the existence of an extraterrestrial civilization. While interacting with extraterrestrial civilization inside the universe, the prelude of earth’s civilization entering the universe civilization system is unveiled. The beginning of the story focuses on the female protagonist, who holds the secrets to her clan, trying to interact with extraterrestrial beings. When the leaders of the world’s two major intelligence agencies learn of this news, they each try to approach the female protagonist to understand more about the truth. This journey where the characters doubt and support each other will begin from here. >
